description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nThrillful Trills:
This creature can equip Spell Gems from any class. At the start of your creatures' turns, they are healed for 5% of their Maximum {STAT_health} for each Sealed Spell Gem each of your creatures have. This trait does not stack.
name: Gold Helmet
